definition: Chinese subculture of young urban migrants, usually of low education, with exaggerated hairstyles, heavy make-up, flamboyant costumes, piercings etc (loanword from "smart")
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
